instructions: On a computer, open Google Maps . If you're using Maps in a mobile browser or an older web browser or operating system, this might not work. Find the place you want to send. Below the search box, click Send to your phone . Then, choose an option: Choose the phone or tablet you want to send to. Click Send to car and then Send . If you don't have a device or car listed, you can send by email or text message. Text isn't available in all countries. Learn how to add or change your phone number stored in your Google Account . You ll get a notification on your phone, tablet, or car.
